title: Innovative financing plans can help speed up green transition
description: The shift to a low-carbon economy required over $6.5 trillion annually for 15 years. Successful climate strategies included policy, regulation, finance, and technology. Blended finance models, combining public and private investment, proved effective in funding green projects in Quebec and emerging economies like India, enhancing the feasibility of such transitions.
